ActJudges Act
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to the Hon. JOHN M. EVANS, from September 1, 2007 to March 31, 2008, in order to allow him to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
